mapper.select: SELECT swo.work_order_id, swo.work_order_code, swo.parent_id, swo.sales_order_id, swo.material_id, swo.work_order_qty, swo.production_qty, swo.output_qty, swo.scheduled_qty, swo.work_order_status, swo.pro_line_id, swo.barcode_rule_set_id, swo.route_id, swo.work_order_type, swo.schedule_date, swo.plan_start_time, swo.plan_end_time, swo.actual_start_time, swo.actual_end_time, swo.create_user_id, swo.create_time, swo.modified_user_id, swo.modified_time, swo.is_delete, swo.org_id, swo.put_into_process_id, swo.output_process_id, swo.scrap_qty, swo.inventory_qty, swo.remark, swo.contract_no, swo.batch_code, swo.option1, swo.option2, swo.option3 FROM mes_pm_work_order swo order by swo.modified_time desc

SELECT swo.work_order_id, swo.work_order_code, swo.parent_id, swo.sales_order_id, swo.material_id, swo.barcode_rule_set_id, swo.work_order_type, swo.plan_start_time, swo.plan_end_time, swo.actual_start_time, swo.actual_end_time, swo.create_user_id, swo.create_time, swo.modified_user_id, swo.modified_time, swo.is_delete, swo.work_order_qty, swo.production_qty, swo.inventory_qty, swo.output_qty, swo.scheduled_qty, swo.put_into_process_id, swo.output_process_id, swo.scrap_qty, swo.work_order_status, swo.pro_line_id, swo.batch_code, swo.option1, swo.option2, swo.option3, sm.material_code AS material_code, sm.material_name AS material_name, sm.material_version AS material_version, sm.material_desc AS material_desc, bt.transfer_quantity AS 'transferQuantity', bppd.quantity AS 'quantity', spl.pro_name AS 'proName', swo.route_id AS 'routeId', sr.route_name AS 'routeName', swo.order_code AS 'orderCode ' FROM mes_pm_work_order swo LEFT JOIN base_material sm ON swo.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bt ON bt.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_plate_parts_det bppd ON bppd.plate_parts_det_id = swo.material_id LEFT JOIN base_route sr ON swo.route_id = sr.route_id LEFT JOIN base_pro_line spl ON swo.pro_line_id = spl.pro_line_id where swo.work_order_id = #{workOrderId}

SELECT srp.route_process_id, srp.route_id, srp.section_id, srp.process_id, srp.next_process_id, srp.previous_process_id, srp.order_num, srp.is_pass, srp.is_must_pass, srp.inspection_time, srp.qualification_id, sp.process_name, sr.route_name FROM base_route_process srp LEFT JOIN base_route sr ON srp.route_id = sr.route_id LEFT JOIN base_process sp ON srp.process_id = sp.process_id where srp.route_id = #{routeId} order by srp.order_num
